page.title: 11Farming.
page.content: Crops grown in this area:- wheat oats barley oil seed rape grass - silage and hay potatoes Farm animals kept in this area:- cattle for beef cows for milk cows for calves sheep for wool goats for milk breeding sheep lambs for meat hens for eggs Farm machinery:- grass cutter combine hay bob cultivator baler and sledge fertiliser elevator crop sprayer pasture topper corn mill wagon tractors land rover digger reversable plough front loder discs sub soiler harrows chain saw corn drill grain drier roller corn auger.
